conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: HENRY, PRINCE of Wales, son to the King.
Prince John of LANCASTER, son to the King.
Henry Percy, surnamed HOTSPUR, his son.
SIR MICHAEL, a friend to the archbishop of York.
Lords, Officers, Sheriff, Vintner, Chamberlain, Drawers, Carriers,
Ostler, Messengers, Servant, Travellers and Attendants.
